questions.question: What is the overall shape or configuration of this upholstered seating piece?
What is the dominant color of the upholstery fabric covering the entire sofa?
Describe the apparent texture of the fabric used on the cushions and the main body of the sofa?
What type of legs support the sectional; what material are they visibly made of?
Considering the armrests, what design style is most clearly exemplified by the sofa's form?
How many distinct cushioned seating sections make up the main portion of this sofa?
Based on the visual appearance, what is the primary material of the sofa's upholstery?
What is the general style of the armrests; are they rolled, straight, or angled?
Considering the visible seams and cushions, does the sofa seem to be of solid or loose cushion construction?
Observing the leg's connection to the sofa's frame, what is the shape of the leg's base?
Does the main body of the sofa have distinct tufting, pleating, or other surface textural features?
Describe the orientation of the chaise lounge section relative to the sofa's main seating area?
In terms of comfort and support, what is the general visual impression of the seating cushions' depth?
Considering the image and overall style, what is the implied intended use of this seating?
What is the overall visual impression given by the color scheme and design choices?
